byline.original: By RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr. and JIM RUTENBERG

abstract: Republican presidential contender Rick Perry's use of private jet owned by Texas businessman Brian D Pardo to fly to campaign events raises questions of whether Perry received unreported campaign gift by paying below-market rates for use of jet.
snippet: If the campaign underpaid for two days on a private jet, that raises the question of whether Gov. Rick Perry of Texas effectively received an unreported campaign contribution.
lead_paragraph: If the campaign underpaid for two days on a private jet, that raises the question of whether Gov. Rick Perry of Texas effectively received an unreported campaign contribution.

headline.main: Questions Raised Over Perry Campaign’s Reimbursements for Use of Private Plane
headline.print_headline: Questions Raised Over Perry Campaign’s Reimbursements for Use of Private Plane
headline.seo: Perry Campaign’s Payment for Private Jet Raises Questions
